lead_paragraph: Despite the fact the San Antonio Spurs went 11-1 while Manu Ginobili was out with an injury, there is no doubt about the importance of the 13-year NBA veteran to the team's run toward another championship.

headline.print_headline: Ginobili's Return Sparks Spurs to Latest Win
headline.main: Ginobili's Return Sparks Spurs to Latest Win

snippet: Despite the fact the San Antonio Spurs went 11-1 while Manu Ginobili was out with an injury, there is no doubt about the importance of the 13-year NBA veteran to the team's run toward another championship....
